name: SmashedSpi
description:
Plunge into the exciting world of spider's adventures. Climb faster, use fewer web and don't let Spi be smashed!

Features:

- Easy to play

- Very challenging and addictive

- 27 cool levels + 3 bonus levels

- Collect coins in bonus levels to buy more items for Spi

Further updates will bring you more levels, characters, obstacles, mechanics and bonuses!
